intro: Talk about shaking things up... earthquakes are a relatively common occurence in the pages of the Bible. How's your seismological knowledge?

questions.ask: What kind of creature started an earthquake by rolling back the stone that sealed Jesus' tomb?
What mountain, where Moses received the Ten Commandments, shook as the Lord came down on it?
What missionary companion of Paul experienced an earthquake in a Philippian jail?
What prophet went through an earthquake only to learn that God spoke in a gentle whisper?
What is one of three miracles accompanying the earthquake that occurred at the moment of Jesus' death?
questions.ans: temple curtain torn from top to bottom; tombs broke open; bodies of dead saints raised to life

intro: Yes, this quiz title has a double meaning - the stories are "engaging" in that they catch your interest... but they're also all about people getting married. What do you know about these Bible couples?

questions.ask: What man was planning to wed Marry when she was found to be pregnant throught the Holy Spirit?
WHat woman lay at the feet of Boaz in a threshing floor - initiating a relationshiop that culminated in marriage?
What woman was Jacob tricked into marrying by his devious uncle Laban?
What nationality of woman did Samon, to his parents' disgust, seek out for a wife?
What daughter did Reuel, a priest of Midian, give to Moses as his wife?

intro: And now the quotation marks surround the fifth letter of the alphabet - with every answer in this quiz starting with E. Excellent!

questions.ask: Where did God plants a garden and place the man, Adam, He had created?
What nationality was the man a young Moses killed and hid in the sand?
What kind of man did the apostle Philip find in a chariot, reading from the book of Isaiah?
What kind of lamb did the prophet Nathan mention in a story that exposed sin in King David's life?
What priestly garment did David use to ask God whether he should pursue the Amalekites, who had kidnapped tow of his wives?

intro: If you eat pizza right before bedtime, you might have some strange dreams... but probably nothing like the visions the prophet Ezekiel had! What do you recall of them?

questions.ask: WHat round objects did Ezekiel see accompanying four unusual "living creatures"?
What gruesome things did Ezerkiel see filling a valley?
What heavenly body did Ezekiel see some two dozen men bowing to at the entrance to God's temple
What unusaul "meal" did Ezekiel eat in the vision that brought him God's calling?
questions.ans: a scroll, or the "roll of a book"

questions.ask: What kind of tool did Ezekiel see a bronzed man using on a new temple on a high mountain?
